playn.core.Surface

Packages that use Surface
playn.core   
playn.core.gl   
 

Uses of Surface in playn.core
 

Classes in playn.core that implement Surface
 class CanvasSurface
          Implementation class, to be used by platforms that implement Surface as just a special case of Canvas.
 

Methods in playn.core that return Surface
 Surface Surface.clear()
          Clears the entire surface to transparent blackness.
 Surface CanvasSurface.clear()

          Draws an image at the specified location.

 Surface SurfaceLayer.surface()
          Returns a surface instance that can be used to render into the off-screen texture associated with this surface layer.
